content.rendered:
Directed by Anubhav Sinha

Written by Anubhav Sinha

Cast Taapsee Pannu (Aarti). Kumud Mishra (Judge – Harish Madhok). Rishi Kapoor (Murad Ali Mohammed). Ashutosh Rana (Santosh). Rajat Kapoor (Danish Javed). Prateik Babbar (Shahid (as Prateik)). Indraneil Sengupta (Aftab). Neena Gupta (Badi Tabassum). Manoj Pahwa (Bilal). Prachi Shah (Choti Tabassum). Uday Vir Singh Yadav (Afzal Sabir). Sumeet Kaul (Riyaz Alam).Anil Rastogi. Shivraj Walvekar (Police Officer). Ehsan Khan (Rashid’s Father). Cricknowle (Rahul).Simran Nisha. Ratnakar Upadhayay (Nayan Tejwani). Vartika Singh (Aayat). Mirza Azhar (Momin). Ashrut Jain (Rashid).Mudassar Khan. Mahesh Chandra Deva (Ats officer bhadohi (as Mahesh Deva)). Kapil Tilhari (Allahabad Reporter). Abdul Quadir Amin (Riyaz). Shreya Bhattacharya (Simi). Ammar Taalwala (Anirudh).Farhan Shahriar.Vinay Ghoshal. Achala Bose (Tiwari’Wife)

Language Hindi

Producers Hejar Abdi. Amit J. Chaudhary. Asli Daud. Aroon Singh Dikky. Arun Singh Dikky. Kaleem Khan. Deepak Mukut. Kamal Mukut. Mohammad Nayem. Sagar Shirgaonkar. Anubhav Sinha. Taranng Takrani. Shilpan Vyas Tinu

Production Benaras Mediawork. Real Touch Studi. Soham Rockstar Entertainment
